companies.title: Software Engineer (Assoc. Manager)
tasks: Assisted in the development and testing of internal software applications.
Provided technical support for end-users, resolving hardware and software issues.
Collaborated with a team of developers to implement new features in web applications.
Designed and implemented responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enhancing user engagement by 30%.
Conducted usability testing and provided feedback to improve site navigation and user experience.
Collaborated with designers to ensure visual consistency across multiple browsers and devices.

companies.title: Service Techician
tasks: Provided instructions to customers on the proper usage of their equipment.
